about_the_game:
A Night With: Super Hero is a provocative, adult-oriented visual novel that drops you into a neon-lit city teetering on the edge of chaos. When a routine evening turns life-threatening, you’re saved by Solaris—a fierce, captivating heroine with a penchant for witty banter and daring rescues. Her bold exterior is as intriguing as it is intimidating, and beneath the super-powered bravado lies a person longing for a deeper connection.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Dialogue System: Your responses impact Solaris’s interest, shaping your relationship’s trajectory. Charm her with confidence, tease her with playful banter, or risk losing her with clumsy remarks.

  • Attraction Meter: Your progress in building trust and chemistry unlocks increasingly intimate encounters, culminating in explicit, passionate scenes for those who win her heart.

  • Branching Paths & Multiple Endings: Your choices matter. Slip up and you might face an abrupt exit, but make the right moves and experience a deeper, more satisfying connection.

  • Immersive Story & Setting: From tense city patrols to quiet, starry park walks, each scenario reveals new facets of Solaris’s hero life—and your potential place in it.

  • High-Quality Artwork & Sound: Enjoy detailed character designs, atmospheric backdrops, and emotive music to enhance every romantic or nail-biting moment.

  • Adult Content: Crafted for players 18+ seeking a bold, lewd, and emotionally charged experience. All characters are depicted as consenting adults.

Will you earn Solaris’s trust and discover what lies beneath her confident mask, or will your missteps leave you watching her disappear into the night? Every decision pulls you deeper into an electrifying world of danger, desire, and daring heroics.

Embrace the thrills, ignite the sparks, and see if you have what it takes to tame a superhero’s heart.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game is intended for mature audiences and features adult themes, including nudity, strong language, and scenes of a sexual nature. All characters depicted are over 18 years old, and interactions are based on consensual relationships developed through the storyline. The mature content is contextually integrated into the character arcs and overall narrative, enhancing the immersive experience while maintaining a respectful and thoughtful approach.

Made with Ren'Py

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD monitor is recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD monitor is recommended

name: A Night With: SuperHero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD monitor is recommended

short_description: An explicit, choice-driven visual novel where you’re saved by a confident, sharp-tongued superheroine. Build trust through playful banter and steamy encounters—or risk her walking away. Experience branching paths, vibrant artwork, and a high-stakes romance set against a neon-lit cityscape.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
